metadata.title: CVE-2019-19035 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
jhead 3.03 is affected by: heap-based buffer over-read. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: ReadJpegSections and process_SOFn in jpgfile.c. The attack vector is: Open a specially crafted JPEG file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-19035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.04-1').
